data.name: EmpNPPhSing_1_TestAction.SqlScript
testCleanupAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Add SQL statements here that you want to run after each test method (unit test) in this test class is run.
In the lower pane, you can add test conditions that verify whether the results of your SQL statements match what you expect. */ DECLARE @maxId INT = 0
DELETE FROM Stores.EmployeePhone WHERE PhoneId > 12
DELETE FROM Stores.StorePhone WHERE PhoneId > 12
DELETE FROM Stores.Phone WHERE PhoneId > 12
DELETE FROM Stores.Store WHERE StoreId > 4
DELETE FROM Stores.Employee WHERE EmployeeId > 1
SELECT @maxId = MAX(PhoneId) FROM Stores.Phone
DBCC CHECKIDENT ('Stores.Phone', RESEED, @maxId)
SELECT @maxId = MAX(EmployeeId) FROM Stores.Employee
DBCC CHECKIDENT ('Stores.Employee', RESEED, @maxId)
SELECT @maxId = MAX(StoreId) FROM Stores.Store
DBCC CHECKIDENT ('Stores.Store', RESEED, @maxId)

data.name: EmpNPPhSing_1_PretestAction.SqlScript
StrNPPhSing_2_TestAction.SqlScript
StrNPPhSing_2_PretestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Add SQL statements here that you want to run before the test script is run.
In the lower pane, you can add test conditions that verify whether the results of your SQL statements match what you expect. */ DECLARE @EntId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @PhoneIds AS TABLE ( PhoneId INT )
INSERT Stores.Store (StoreCode, StoreName, StoreAddress1, StoreAddress2, IsWarehouse, EntityPhoneId) VALUES ('STR04', 'Test Store', 'Add Test - 1', 'Add Test -2', 0, NEWID())
SELECT @EntId = EntityPhoneId FROM Stores.Store WHERE StoreCode = 'STR04'
INSERT Stores.Phone (PhoneNumber, IsPrimary) OUTPUT inserted.PhoneId INTO @PhoneIds VALUES ('7775556661', 1), ('9775556661', 0), ('8775556661', 0)
INSERT INTO Stores.StorePhone SELECT PhoneId, @EntId FROM @PhoneIds
SELECT * FROM Stores.Store s INNER JOIN Stores.StorePhone sp ON s.EntityPhoneId = sp.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON sp.PhoneId = p.PhoneId WHERE s.StoreCode = 'STR04'

data.name: EmpPriWtAlPs_5_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
-- database unit test for Stores.uspRemovePhoneNumber DECLARE @EntityPhoneId AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @IsStore AS BIT, @PhoneDelXML AS XML(CONTENT [Stores].[DelPhoneXMLSchema]), @AltPh INT;
SET @IsStore = 0
SELECT @EntityPhoneId = EntityPhoneId FROM Stores.Employee WHERE LastName = 'TestLN' AND FirstName = 'TestFN'
SELECT @AltPh = MIN(p.PhoneId) FROM Stores.Employee e INNER JOIN Stores.EmployeePhone ep ON e.EntityPhoneId = ep.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON p.PhoneId = ep.PhoneId WHERE e.LastName = 'TestLN' AND e.FirstName = 'TestFN' AND IsPrimary = 0
SET @PhoneDelXML = ( SELECT 1 AS '@IsPrimary', @AltPh AS '@AlternatePrimary', MIN(p.PhoneId) AS '*' FROM Stores.Employee e INNER JOIN Stores.EmployeePhone ep ON e.EntityPhoneId = ep.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON p.PhoneId = ep.PhoneId WHERE e.LastName = 'TestLN' AND e.FirstName = 'TestFN' AND IsPrimary = 1 FOR XML PATH('PhoneId'), ROOT('PhoneIdsToDelete'), TYPE )
EXECUTE [Stores].[uspRemovePhoneNumber] @EntityPhoneId, @IsStore, @PhoneDelXML;
SELECT ep.* FROM Stores.Employee e INNER JOIN Stores.EmployeePhone ep ON e.EntityPhoneId = ep.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON p.PhoneId = ep.PhoneId WHERE e.LastName = 'TestLN' AND e.FirstName = 'TestFN'
SELECT ep.* FROM Stores.Employee e INNER JOIN Stores.EmployeePhone ep ON e.EntityPhoneId = ep.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON p.PhoneId = ep.PhoneId WHERE e.LastName = 'TestLN' AND e.FirstName = 'TestFN' AND p.IsPrimary = 1

data.name: EmpPriWtAlPs_5_PretestAction.SqlScript
StrPriWtAlPs_6_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
-- database unit test for Stores.uspRemovePhoneNumber DECLARE @EntityPhoneId AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @IsStore AS BIT, @PhoneDelXML AS XML(CONTENT [Stores].[DelPhoneXMLSchema]), @AlPh INT;
SET @IsStore = 1
SELECT @EntityPhoneId = EntityPhoneId FROM Stores.Store WHERE StoreCode = 'STR04'
SELECT @AlPh = MIN(p.PhoneId) FROM Stores.Store s INNER JOIN Stores.StorePhone sp ON s.EntityPhoneId = sp.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON p.PhoneId = sp.PhoneId WHERE s.StoreCode = 'STR04' AND IsPrimary = 0
SET @PhoneDelXML = ( SELECT 1 AS '@IsPrimary', @AlPh AS '@AlternatePrimary', MIN(p.PhoneId) AS '*' FROM Stores.Store s INNER JOIN Stores.StorePhone sp ON s.EntityPhoneId = sp.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON p.PhoneId = sp.PhoneId WHERE s.StoreCode = 'STR04' AND IsPrimary = 1 FOR XML PATH('PhoneId'), ROOT('PhoneIdsToDelete'), TYPE )
EXECUTE [Stores].[uspRemovePhoneNumber] @EntityPhoneId, @IsStore, @PhoneDelXML;
SELECT * FROM Stores.Store s INNER JOIN Stores.StorePhone sp ON s.EntityPhoneId = sp.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON sp.PhoneId = p.PhoneId WHERE s.StoreCode = 'STR04'
SELECT * FROM Stores.Store s INNER JOIN Stores.StorePhone sp ON s.EntityPhoneId = sp.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON sp.PhoneId = p.PhoneId WHERE s.StoreCode = 'STR04' AND IsPrimary = 1

data.name: StrPriWtAlPs_6_PretestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Add SQL statements here that you want to run before the test script is run.
In the lower pane, you can add test conditions that verify whether the results of your SQL statements match what you expect. */ DECLARE @EntId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @PhoneIds AS TABLE ( PhoneId INT )
INSERT Stores.Store (StoreCode, StoreName, StoreAddress1, StoreAddress2, IsWarehouse, EntityPhoneId) VALUES ('STR04', 'Test Store', 'Add Test - 1', 'Add Test -2', 0, NEWID())
SELECT @EntId = EntityPhoneId FROM Stores.Store WHERE StoreCode = 'STR04'
INSERT Stores.Phone (PhoneNumber, IsPrimary) OUTPUT inserted.PhoneId INTO @PhoneIds VALUES ('7775556661', 1), ('9775556661', 0), ('8775556661', 0)
INSERT INTO Stores.StorePhone SELECT PhoneId, @EntId FROM @PhoneIds
SELECT * FROM Stores.Store s INNER JOIN Stores.StorePhone sp ON s.EntityPhoneId = sp.EntityPhoneId INNER JOIN Stores.Phone p ON sp.PhoneId = p.PhoneId WHERE s.StoreCode = 'STR04'
